channel.title: MoneyIsle! Development Team!
channel.description:
[size=16pt]Someone Please Make Me A Banner! :D[/size]
I am starting a new project and it will be called MoneyIsle. It will have both a server and a client.(Maybe webclient too) This will be a development team! Not a solo project. This is anthony00 for those of you who knew him. This new server will be based on a d4roks scratch source. It will have the following features: -Full CastleWars -Unique Starting Area -It will have full working teleports(not original runescape ones) -Duel arena will be team pking area -It will have "new" items -It will include a wide variety of skills -Will have 2-3 minigames -10+ training areas with different monsters -Full working autocast feature -No dupes in anything -Some monsters will attack with mage -Fully working specs -More To Come
Open Positions Are:
Server Coders Client Coders Testers
[size=16pt]To join you must fill out this form![/size]
[code] Client Or Server: Experience: Reason: Trustworthy?: Msn or Aim? Screen name: [/code]
Pictures will be added as I progress.

item.title: MoneyIsle! Development Team!

item.description:
@MrMoney wrote:

[size=16pt]Someone Please Make Me A Banner! :D[/size]

I am starting a new project and it will be called MoneyIsle. It will have both a server and a client.(Maybe webclient too) This will be a development team! Not a solo project.
This is anthony00 for those of you who knew him.
This new server will be based on a d4roks scratch source.
It will have the following features:
-Full CastleWars
-Unique Starting Area
-It will have full working teleports(not original runescape ones)
-Duel arena will be team pking area
-It will have “new” items
-It will include a wide variety of skills
-Will have 2-3 minigames
-10+ training areas with different monsters
-Full working autocast feature
-No dupes in anything
-Some monsters will attack with mage
-Fully working specs
-More To Come

Client Coders
